meanings.definition: To forget or fail to remember
meanings.sent1: I disremembered where I put my keys.
meanings.sent2: She disremembered her friend's birthday and felt terrible.
meanings.sent3: The absent-minded professor disremembered his own lecture notes.
meanings.sent4: The old man disremembered the past like a faded photograph.
meanings.sent5: The magic spell made everyone disremembered the secret treasure's location.

meanings.definition: Not to recall or bring to mind
meanings.sent1: He disremembered the lyrics to his favorite song.
meanings.sent2: The trauma caused her to disremember the events of that night.
meanings.sent3: The comedian purposely disremembered his own punchline for comedic effect.
meanings.sent4: The foggy morning disremembered the outline of the distant mountains.
meanings.sent5: The hypnotist's suggestion made the audience disremembered their own names.
